titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing that the United States should not undertake negotiations to compensate Iran in connection with the shooting down of Iran Air Flight 655 until the Government of Iran undertakes negotiations to compensate for attacks by Iranian military forces on civilian shipping and United States Armed Forces in the Persian Gulf.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.
Executive Comment Requested from State, DOD, Justice.

bill.summary: 7/7/1988--Introduced. States that the United States should not negotiate compensation or reparation payments to Iran or any party in Iran in connection with the shooting down of Iran Air Flight 655 unless and until the Government of Iran negotiates compensation or reparation payments for attacks by Iranian military forces on civilian shipping and U.S. armed forces in the Persian Gulf.
